programme.title: Go Youth!
programme.desc: Four teenagers, each with unique dreams, passions, and fears, attempt to navigate through the contemporary adult world of Mexico City. The pursuit of their youthful ideals is met with setbacks along the way as we follow in their journey.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: A Far Shore
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Aoi is an underage mother struggling to make ends meet and dealing with her husband’s violent temper. After her husband loses his job, their continuous fights lead them to a social downfall.

programme.title: Running On Sand
programme.desc: When an Eritrean refugee about to be deported from Israel is mistaken for the Nigerian striker just signed to a struggling soccer team, his fate depends on the team’s success in this charming, socially relevant dramedy.

programme.title: Love and Mazel Tov
programme.desc: In a bid to impress Anne, the attractive Jewish bookstore owner, Daniel pretended to be Jewish. As the lie gets out of hand, he can only hope she will continue to love him when the truth is inevitably revealed.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Paralympian
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories. The one leg athlete sinks into a deep depression, until one day he is offered to try his luck at the Paralympic games.

programme.title: Torch
programme.desc: In a war zone, two sisters, stuck in a basement while waiting for their father, attempt to distract themselves from the desperation of their situation by playing games and recounting old stories.

programme.title: I Was, I Am, I Will Be
programme.desc: Baran, a Kurdish gigolo seeking a better life in Europe meets Marion, a German pilot struggling with her cancer diagnosis. Entering into what was initially a sham marriage, the pair's relationship develops into something deeper.

programme.title: All The Songs We Never Sang
programme.desc: Rebellious teen Natsumi ventures from Tokyo to a small island to meet her aunt and learn the art of pearl diving (but secretly to find a treasure she was told about as a child).

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Under The Fig Trees
programme.desc: Fig pickers – young and old, men and women - flirt, conspire and exchange snatches of gossip while toiling in the gorgeous Tunisian sunlight.
